school_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Such a chill class. It\'s a no brainer take it with Chitwood. Got to write a fair amount of cool poems and imporved a ton at writing poetry was helpful during office hours in critiquing my poems. Only thing I will say that was annoying is that he grades participation subjectively but just speak a ton and you\'ll be fine. Great class and great guy.

school_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: He gave helpful comments and his facial expressions during class were the best! He is more than willing to help you however much you need to edit your work, and he pays attention to how you progress during the semester. I really enjoyed this course.

school_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Chitwood was the worst creative writing professor that I had at UNC. His scope of understanding and creativity was limited, and the class itself was structured very inefficiently. We barely got to workshop, and many people didn\'t get comments back before having to turn in the next assignment. For a good class, take Shapiro or Seay, but not Chitwood

school_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Mike is by far the best prof at UNC. He is super fair, the work load isn\'t too bad, and he has a fine wife.
